item.description:
Imagine a place which makes pasta worth going to out for. You can't help but to notice that you are in an amazing place to dine, as you smell each dish and taste the creamy, succulent pasta. You just sit back and ask: Just how creative are the cooks? Just how happy are you prepared to be? What a great way to end the week and a fabulous way to end the month. A true hidden gem with inexpensive prices all around. Just us to find out!

Here's the latest review: "This pasta night was fantastic. What a bargain for supper. The food was delicious and was capped off by a birthday in the house and a 50/50 raffle."

This recurring dinner meetup is a can't miss! It occurs the last Friday of every month. Delicious Pasta Nights!  It runs from 6 - 8 and the cost is $7 a person.  A good time is had by all and it's also a great chance to catch up with some old/new friends.

Time: 6 pm
Cost: $7.00
Menu: Salad, pasta with meatballs and sausage / CASH BAR AT MEMBER PRICES
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Dick Losh around the entrance or ask for him by name

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Pasta Nights @ Newington Knights of Columbus - AMAZING!!!
